title: Black Beauty
creator_credit: James Hill, Tony Tenser, Chilton Film Productions and Tigon Pictures
brief_description: Adapted by Wolf Mankowitz from the classic children’s book by Anna Sewell, Black Beauty tells the story of a luckless horse who is passed from hand to hand but is finally restored to its original young master and has a happy retirement. Stars Mark Lester, Walter Slezak and Patrick Mower.
